item.title: AI‑Driven Six Sigma: Merging DMAIC & Intelligent Automation
item.description: An in-depth exploration of integrating Six Sigma DMAIC methodology with AI‑powered tools to optimize software delivery and operational workflows.

item.title: Cloud Strategy & Cost Efficiency: AWS Business Analysis
item.description: A strategic examination of Amazon Web Services (AWS)—applying SWOT, Porter’s Five Forces, and Ansoff’s Growth Matrix—to drive architecture optimization and cost savings.

item.title: 5S Workplace Excellence: TechGadget Inc. Case Study
item.description: A hands‑on 5S implementation in a manufacturing environment—Sort, Set in Order, Shine, Standardize, Sustain—delivering lasting efficiency and quality gains.

item.title: Accelerating AI: NVIDIA GPU Strategy & Business Analysis
item.description: A corporate review of NVIDIA’s GPU leadership, using SWOT, Porter’s Five Forces, and Ansoff’s Matrix—culminating in lean‑management recommendations for maximum efficiency.
